price: 56 A ceux qui auront rejeté la foi, J’infligerai ici-bas et dans l’au-delà un terrible châtiment dont nul ne pourra les sauver.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَأُعَذِّبُهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna kafarū fa-uʿadhibuhum ʿadhāban shadīdan fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
